n0:createOraclePackageBody.n0:source: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PACKAGE BODY "DOCAI_LOG_API" as PROCEDURE log( p_action VARCHAR2, p_source_id NUMBER, p_type VARCHAR2, p_log_lvl VARCHAR2, p_description VARCHAR2, p_title VARCHAR2, p_status_reason VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, p_status_stacktrace CLOB DEFAULT empty_clob() ) AS PRAGMA AUTONOMOUS_TRANSACTION; BEGIN INSERT INTO DOCAI_ENTITY_LOG ( SOURCE_ID, TYPE, LOG_LVL, DESCRIPTION, TITLE, STATUS_REASON, STATUS_STACKTRACE, ACTION ) VALUES( p_source_id, p_type, p_log_lvl, p_description, p_title, p_status_reason, p_status_stacktrace, p_action ); commit; END log; end;
